about.title: About Utopia
about.subtitle: Connecting students with the best educators
about.missionText: Utopia is an educational marketplace that connects students and parents with qualified, verified teachers for personalized learning experiences — both online and in-person.
about.visionText: We envision a world where quality education is accessible to everyone, regardless of location. Through technology, we bridge the gap between learners and exceptional educators.
about.step1Desc: Browse our verified educators by subject, location, and rating.
about.step2Desc: Choose a time that works for you — online or in-person.
about.step3Desc: Attend your session, leave feedback, and track your progress.

help.faq1Q: How do I find a teacher?
help.faq1A: Use the search page to browse teachers by subject, location, and rating. You can also use the map view to find teachers near you.
help.faq2Q: How do I book a session?
help.faq2A: Visit a teacher's profile, choose an available time slot, and confirm your booking. You'll receive a confirmation email.
help.faq3A: Yes, you can cancel a booking from your dashboard. Please check the cancellation policy for any applicable fees.
help.faq4Q: How do I become a teacher on Utopia?
help.faq4A: Register as a teacher, complete your profile, and submit your verification documents. Our team will review your application.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At Utopia, we take your privacy seriously. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.
privacy.section1Text: We collect information you provide directly, such as your name, email, phone number, and location when you create an account or use our services.
privacy.section2Text: We use your information to provide and improve our services, match you with teachers, process bookings, and communicate important updates.
privacy.section3Text: We share limited information with teachers when you book a session (e.g., your name and contact details). We never sell your personal data to third parties.
privacy.section4Text: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your data, including encryption, secure servers, and regular security audits.
privacy.section5Text: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information at any time through your account settings or by contacting us.
privacy.section6Text: If you have questions about this privacy policy, please contact us at privacy@utopia-learning.com.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: Welcome to Utopia. By using our platform, you agree to the following terms and conditions.
terms.section1Text: By accessing or using Utopia, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you disagree, please do not use the platform.
terms.section2Text: You must provide accurate information when creating an account. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your credentials.
terms.section3Text: All bookings are subject to teacher availability. Payments are processed securely. Cancellation policies vary by teacher.
terms.section4Text: Teachers must provide accurate qualifications, maintain professional conduct, and deliver sessions as scheduled.
terms.section5Text: Users may not engage in harassment, fraud, or any activity that violates applicable laws or disrupts the platform.
terms.section6Text: Utopia acts as a marketplace connecting students with teachers. We are not liable for the quality of instruction or disputes between users.
terms.section7Text: We may update these terms from time to time. Continued use of the platform constitutes acceptance of any changes.
